Hi, welcome to my website. I am currently a Mobile developer residing in Greater Boston area. I recieved my bachelors in Computer Science(major) and Biology(minor) from Boston University in May of 2018. My interests are in Android and iOS Development.

Khoji (React.js/Node.js/MysQL): A website, for Nepalese, to post their listing. I decided to built this website because currently Nepalese have to pay 5-7$ to a inferior website to even post the ad.It's in the testing phase.

Y2Y Mobile: An android app, for Y2Y home Shelter, to gather information about their stay in the home shelter. Guest can even look at their To-do List and events.

Barcode Price: An iOS app that would scan Barcode and give you MSRP of the product. We consume Walmart open API to get the information and store it in the Coredata as the history object.
